title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 13.7 - Amendment of pleadings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 13.7 - Amendment of pleadings

State Regulations

Any party may amend or supplement a pleading at any time
prior to the submission of the hearing officer's report to the administrative
tribunal, by leave of the hearing officer, if there is no substantial prejudice
to any other party. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
13.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
